name: Zomnia
description:
Zomnia is a play on words, it's the mix between Zombie and Insomnia, Zomnia is an RPG game about Zee a zombie who just can't seem to fall asleep! Your goal is to try to help Zee get the rest they need. 

(NOTE: This is not the full game, this is only a fraction of what I want the full game to be actually. This is only a beta version for testing mechanics. More updates will be in the future!)

(UPDATE NOTE: This is still not the full game, it is being made with GB Studio which has a vast amount of limitations, I cant find any active forums and the programs been updated 3 times now so old forums arent helpful. I am still just learning and this is now a Demo version. until I find another beginner platform for RPG game design that is free (I do not wish to spend money in case I give up on this little hobby) I hope that you can still enjoy this tho!)
